front.title: IPv6 Anycast Binding using Return Routability

abstract.t: Today, the use of IPv6 anycast is limited. This document proposes amechanism by which TCP/SCTP and stateful protocols using UDP cansecurely discover the mapping from an anycast address to a unicastaddress that can be used until a failure is detected. The mechanismreuses the Mobile IPv6 Return Routability and Binding Updatemechanism.
